abstract: Alexander Khoroshilov of Russia wins night slalom event in Shladming, Austria, giving his country its first World Cup victory in more than three decades.
lead_paragraph: Alexander Khoroshilov won a night slalom in Schladming, Austria, by a huge margin, for the first Russian World Cup victory in more than three decades.
snippet: Alexander Khoroshilov won a night slalom in Schladming, Austria, by a huge margin, for the first Russian World Cup victory in more than three decades.
